content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceed. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(s::String, text_width::Int=10)
    result = ""
    for word in split(s)
        if length(result) + length(word) > text_width
            result *= "\n"
        end
        result *= word
    end
    return result
end

julia> wrap_string("Hello, world!", 5)
"Hello,\nworld!"
```
